0.9.0.name: wordpress/sticky-manager
0.9.0.description:
Allows simple management of sticky posts from a centralized admin panel.

Features

  • Manage sticky posts from centralized admin panel (under "Posts")
  • AJAX search to quickly add posts (thanks, Microkid!)
  • Easily "unstick" current sticky posts

Acknowledgements

I'm greatly indebted to Microkid (microkid.net) for the AJAX search form (from his Related Posts plugin), which is reproduced here with only slight modifications. The CSS from that plugin was also used as a jumping-off point for this one.
